author: Badwolf_TW
description: Integrates OpenAI's API with your Discord server, allowing advanced AI interactions such as responding to messages, generating images, and supporting custom prompts.
end_user_data_statement: This cog securely stores API keys and configurations. It does not persistently store user data or metadata beyond what is necessary for its operation.
install_msg: Thank you for installing the OpenAI Chat cog! Configure it by setting your API key using `[p]openai setkey`. Customize channels, prompts, and more with `[p]openai` commands.
name: OpenAIChat
